\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.port}
\label{configuration:DatabasePort}
\ClearAPI
The port of the database. If \ref{configuration:DatabaseConnection} is not set, this field is not evaluated. However, it is much more convenient to use single properties than \ref{configuration:DatabaseConnection}.
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE - DO NOT EDIT
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.port}}]
database.port=1521
\end{lstlisting}
